properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains " -RemoveDefinitions" and ProcessCommandLine contains " -All") and (FolderPath endswith "\\MpCmdRun.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "MpCmdRun.exe")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Adversaries may disable security tools to avoid possible detection of their tools and activities by removing Windows Defender Definition Files
